title: Taoist Inner Alchemy: Neidan & Immortality Practices

keyTexts: Secret of the Golden Flower: Foundational neidan text on meditation and circulation of light
Baopuzi: Ge Hong's 4th century classic on external and internal alchemy
Wuzhen pian: Zhang Boduan's masterpiece on internal alchemy (11th century)
Needham Vol. 5: Definitive scholarly treatment of Chinese alchemy
researchValue: Essential for understanding Chinese internal alchemy and its influence on Jungian psychology (Wilhelm's translation influenced Jung). Documents the parallel alchemical tradition to Western alchemy.
